text.*:
This is a list of the suttas in the Majjhima Nikaya collection of middle-length discourses, part of the Tripitaka Buddhist canon.

Contents

  • 1 General List
  • 2 Summary Of Selected Suttas
    • 2.1 MN 2 All The Fermentations
    • 2.2 MN 33 The Greater Cowherd Discourse
  • 3 See also
  • 4 External links

Summary Of Selected Suttas[edit]

MN 2 All The Fermentations[edit]

Also called "All The Taints" (Bhikkhu Bodhi) This sutta explains the seven ways to remove the taints by seeing, restraining, using, enduing, avoiding, removing, and by developing.

MN 33 The Greater Cowherd Discourse[edit]

This sutta explains the eleven ways for a bhikkhu to make progress in the path.
